subSubSection.paragraph: BRAZIL : São Paulo: Pirassununga—Bug ( 1973 ).

Microcylloepus angustus Hinton, 1940 d: 307
MEXICO : Temascaltepec—Hinton ( 1940 d). PERU : Tingo Maria—Spangler ( 1966 ).
